title: Paths in a Tree
description:
This is an interactive problem.

 vertices. Note that the interactor is adaptive, which means that the hidden vertices may change depending on your queries, but will not contradict previous queries. Interaction 
To find any vertex on the path, you can use no more than âŒŠ ğ‘› 2 âŒ‹+1 âŒŠ ğ‘› 2 âŒ‹ + 1

When you find one of the required vertices, output one line in the following format: "! ğ‘£ " (1 â‰¤ ğ‘£ â‰¤ ğ‘› 1 â‰¤ ğ‘£ â‰¤ ğ‘›), where ğ‘£ is the vertex you found.

After outputting a query, do not forget to output a newline and flush the output buffer. Otherwise, you will receive a verdict of Solution "timed out". To flush the buffer, use:
